name: Muxgic
description:
Welcome Stranger to the village of Muxgic!

A village of light and shadow;  Find the totems  of the Wolf, the Bear & the Unicorn to let the village see their light. Harness the power of music & colour in your great adventure in this mystical village.

A VR Adventure Game made for RainbowJam 2017 by
Rune Berg, Mikey Fewkes & Jimmy Magnusson
